channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.description: ðŸ”´ 13:42 Air alarm to Ternopil Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Ternopil_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
